CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c, "Accepted") && RecordType.Name != 'Renewal Quote' && RecordType.Name != 'Amendment Quote' && APT_Contracted_Product_Count__c > 0 && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(APT_Dangerous_Goods_Status__c,"Pending Approval")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(APT_Dangerous_Goods_Status__c,"Rejected")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(APT_Overweight_Approval_Status__c,"Rejected")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(APT_Overweight_Approval_Status__c,"Pending Approval"))) && OR(NOT(APT_ACIC_Request_required_for_Contract__c), AND(APT_ACIC_Request_required_for_Contract__c, ACIC_Request_Approved__c)) , HYPERLINK("/lightning/cmp/c__APT_ContractServiceDetailsWrapper?c__proposalId="&Id&'&c__isST='&TEXT(Is_Startrack_Proposal__c)&'&c__isManualContract=false', IMAGE("/resource/APT_Create1", "Create"),"_self"), NULL )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Click this button to create a new Agreement (Contract).
CustomField.label: Create Agreement (Contract)
